JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: MANAGER FOR ATAMI KOLDING RESTAURANT WANTED
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Atami Kolding søger en Restaurant Manager.

Atami Kolding is loooking for a new Resturant Manager.

Your task will be:

  • Operation: Being in charge of the daily operations of both restuarants, including employee leadership, shift scheduling and uptimizing the work quality.
  • Economics: keeping up with the economic results, budget planning, implementing of effeciency measures.
  • Staff: recruiting, traning of employees, as weel as creating a positive work enviroment.
  • Guest experience: Ensuring a high standard of food quality, service and cleanliness, as well as continous improvement of the guests experiences. 

We are looking for someone who:

  • Leadership: Your are a strong leader with experience in motivating and developing amployees.
  • Result-oriented: you are goal-oriented and have a strong drive to achieve good results.
  • Experience: You have relevant experience from the service industry, preferably in similar positions.
  • Costumer service: You have strong focus on guest satisfaction and thrive in a fast enviroment.

We offer: 

  • An exciting and challenging position in a dynamic company.
  • An opportunity to make a big impact in our resturant.
  • A good working enviroment with committed colleagues.

Are you our new Restaurant Manager?

Send your application and CV to Louiseatami@gmail.com 


Dine opgaver:
* Drift: Ansvar for den daglige drift af begge restauranter, herunder personaleledelse, vagtplanlægning og optimering af arbejdsgange.
* Økonomi: Opfølgning på økonomiske resultater, budgetlægning og implementering af effektiviseringstiltag.
* Personalet: Rekruttering, oplæring og udvikling af medarbejdere, samt skabelse af et positivt arbejdsmiljø.
* Gæsteoplevelse: Sikring af en høj standard for madkvalitet, service og renlighed, samt løbende forbedring af gæsternes oplevelse.
Din profil:
* Lederskab: Du er en stærk leder med erfaring i at motivere og udvikle medarbejdere.
* Resultatorienteret: Du er målrettet og har en stærk drive til at opnå gode resultater.
* Erfaring: Du har relevant erfaring fra servicebranchen, gerne i en lignende stilling.
* Kundeservice: Du har et stort fokus på gæstetilfredshed og trives i et hektisk miljø.
Vi tilbyder:
* En spændende og udfordrende stilling i en dynamisk virksomhed.
* Mulighed for at sætte dit præg på vores restauranter.
* Et godt arbejdsmiljø med engagerede kolleger.
Er du vores nye Restaurant Manager?
Send din ansøgning og CV til Louiseatami@gmail.com

 

Atami Sushi restaurant, Looking for a manager.

Your Assignments:
